1.speaker: A
sentence: I think it's too much for me to play golf.

2.speaker: B
sentence: Once you get the hang of it, It's just a matter of time.
한번 너가 요령이 생기면, 그건 단지 시간문제야.

3.speaker: A
sentence: Would it be possible to catch up with you in a year?

4.speaker: B
sentence: I guess so. For starter, try to get used to it.

5.speaker: A
sentence: All the practice will pay off in the near feature.
모든 연습은 성과가 있을꺼야 가까운 미래에(조만간)

6.speaker: B
sentence: It's always easier said then done.
